title: Udemy MASTERY COURSE 2018: Microsoft Azure Active Directory
description:
Description

Microsoft Azure is the fastest growing cloud platform in the world. One of the key building blocks of Microsoft Azure is its network services. This course is designed to help you to build strong foundation & provide hands on experience in Microsoft Azure network services.You will learn how to implement and manage user and group accounts, join client computers, and implement single sign-on and multi-factor authentication. (Industry standard protocols such as SAML 2.0, WS-Federation, and OpenID Connect make sign-on possible on a variety of platforms.) To wrap up the course, David reviews the more advanced features in Azure AD and Azure AD Connect, including syncing on-premises Active Directory and Azure AD, and troubleshooting an Azure AD deployment.

So, start taking this course and put yourself in high demand in the world of IT and command higher salary!!!
Who is the target audience?

    Anyone who is interested in learning about Microsoft Azure

Requirements

    Basic understanding of Azure & computer network knowledge
    Students should have an interest in learning the basics of Microsoft Azure
    Students should be familiar with the concept of virtualization
